composed with love from my hook to yours http //crochetamore blogspot com finished size 12 inch square materials approx 4 ounces worsted weight yarn orchid used for example us size i hook tapestry needle for weaving in ends special stitches beg double_crochet cluster beg double_crochet cluster chain 2 yo insert hook in same st/space yo draw up loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook twice yo draw through all 4 loops on hook beg treble_crochet cluster beg treble_crochet cluster chain 3 yo twice insert hook in same st/space yo draw up loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook twice twice yo draw through all 4 loops on hook double_crochet cluster double_crochet cluster yo insert hook in designated st/space yo draw up loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook yo insert hook in same st/space yo draw up loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook twice yo draw through all 4 loops on hook treble_crochet cluster treble_crochet cluster yo twice insert hook in designated st/space yo draw up loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook twice yo twice insert hook in same st/space yo draw up loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook twice twice yo draw through all 4 loops on hook chain 5 round 1 double_crochet in 5th chain from hook counts as beg chain 3 + chain 1 + double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 6 times join with slip_stitch in top of beg chain 3 being sure to leave the chain 1 space 8 double_crochet 8 chain 1 space round 2 slip_stitch into next chain 1 space chain 1 single_crochet in same space chain 2 skip next st single_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 2 skip next st 7 times
